an2.131:1: "Bhikkhus, a bhikkhunī endowed with faith, rightly aspiring, should aspire thus: ‘May I become like the bhikkhunīs Khemā and Uppalavaṇṇā!’ This is the standard and criterion for my bhikkhunī disciples, that is, the bhikkhunīs Khemā and Uppalavaṇṇā."[n.320] The two chief bhikkhunī disciples respectively in regard to wisdom and psychic potency. SeeAN.236 & AN.237.
